description: Aiton Elementary School is a community of learners made up of staff, parents and student stakeholders. We are committed to providing all children with a rigorous, differentiated academic program that will enable them to be successful in middle school and beyond. We offer a variety of extracurricular activities and before and after care programs.
transit: U5, U6 (Mayfair-Marshall Heights Line), U8 (Capitol Hts-Benning Hts Line), W4 (Deanwood-Alabama Ave. Line), 96, 97 (East Capitol Street-Cardozo Line)
